name: Che
info: A Sinner who is adept at Physical Output. Deals Core Damage when casting an Ultimate.
maniaIntensifyText: Core Damage dealt by Ultimate is increased by 1 point.
criminalRecord:
Core member of Whitestone Industries, and the one who shelters the Sinner Bai Yi and abets her criminal activity on multiple occasions. The person in charge of Whitestone's grey-money deals, forged accounts, and superficial business.

--

During his employment at Whitestone Industries, the subject did not often take part in the actual //business//. Whitestone Industries is also not a bona fide shell company. It is simply incapable of making a profit. When he was hired by Chief, the subject demonstrated excellent driving and combat skills, so he's become one of the fighters after joining the MBCC. Despite that, his lazy attitude often hinders him from fully applying himself.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Che gives life to cold weapons in his possession. During close combat, his weapons become animated, and are capable of striking targets further away before returning to Che's hands.

+++* Awakening Signs
Seems to have awakened when he was young, but the circumstances around his first display of his powers remain resistant to calculation and deduction. The reason behind his awakening is currently in doubt.

+++* Corruption State
Infection appears to be in its early stages, with no clear external signs or any major impact on mental state.
ecbFlavourText:
"I accept your invitation."
"After all, it's more amusing this way, no?"
arrestRec1: Ran into the Chief's entourage in Syndicate while working as a designated driver. To preserve himself, Che voluntarily joined the MBCC as "reinforcement".
arrestRec2: Unable to recover any information regarding Che's early years. Details of his birth, parentage, childhood, and education remains a mystery.
arrestRec3: Every one of Bai Yi's false identities and bankrupt companies when she first arrived in Syndicate has been managed by Che. For reasons unknown, Che eventually set up Whitestone Industries in Syndicate with Bai Yi, and the duo's movements became more stable.
arrestRec4: After K.K. joined Whitestone, Che's workload was greatly lightened, and his sightings in Syndicate became rare. Sources claim that his reliable administrative skills are the only thing keeping Whitestone afloat all this time.
servingTerm1: Extremely passive when it comes to work in MBCC. Completes his missions with minimal effort, and mocks other Sinners who put effort into their missions. He has suffered multiple warnings for his negative influence, but his behavior remains unchanged.
servingTerm2: Possesses many strange skills: driving, lockpicking, stealth, tailing, burglary, lookout... His carefree life in MBCC has rendered his many skills useless.
servingTerm3: Stays in all day and rarely joins social events that other Sinners have organized. But thanks to Bai Yi's reputation in Syndicate, many Sinners know of Che. They spontaneously refer to him as "that Fish-Eye of Whitestone".
servingTerm4: Believing that "interesting stuff is meant to be shared with friends", Che puts on re-runs of DeadLover Radio at max volume in the Chief's office. To Che, however, it seems that the Chief's reaction is more interesting than what's on the radio.
emotionCheck1:
[Che looks at you and seems confused.]

**Che:** Don‚Äôt you think it‚Äôs a waste of time hanging out with us all day?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Work is just work. It‚Äôs not dull or interesting.
 * **Che:** Aha. You are cold-hearted, Chief.
 * **Che:** üò•

* **Prompt:** I think it‚Äôs okay. At least it isn‚Äôt boring.
 * **Che:** It‚Äôs not boring, that‚Äôs for sure. But it‚Äôd be even better if I didn‚Äôt have to do so much work.
 * **Che:** üòê
emotionCheck2:
[Che rubs his eyes. it seems like he just woke up.]

**Che:** What? Have you come to slack off as well?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** It's not slacking off. Just trying to find somewhere to spend some time alone.
 * **Che:** What a coincidence. That's what I've been telling myself.
 * **Che:** üòê

* **Prompt:** I'm just here looking for some stuff. I didn't expect I would find a person instead.
 * **Che:** Ah, I see. in that case, you might as well throw me out too.
 * **Che:** üò¶
supervision1:
++* ‚ö† Earplugs

//Che is sleeping soundly during the hypnotherapy session.//

**System Notifications:** Che was sleeping soundly in today's hypnotherapy session and didn't react to it at all. Later on, you realized it was because he was wearing earplugs.

* **Prompt:** Increase the security check level
supervision2:
++* ‚ö† Lock Picking Expert

//The door to the Outdoor Activity Area won't open. Everyone is worried and anxious.//

**System Notifications:** An employee was careless and locked the key inside the tool room next to the Outdoor Activity Area. Thankfully, Che was there and took two strings of hair from the floor to quickly pick the lock.

* **Prompt:** It has to be Che.
supervision3:
++* ‚ö† Negative Impact

//Some people seem to be slacking off lately.//

**System Notifications:** Che seems to be even lazier and slacking off more often than usual. This has negatively impacted the morale in the Bureau.

* **Prompt:** Give a serious warning and a punishment
supervision4:
++* ‚ö† Strange Behavior

//Faye told you about some anomalies.//

**System Notifications:** Che has been visiting the black market frequently these few days and acting secretive. You wonder what he is up to.

* **Prompt:** Continue the observation

**System Notifications:** Eventually, you realized that some employees at the black market had been asking Che to help them smuggle goods.
supervision5:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† A Friend in Need

//To your surprise, Che accepts a mission willingly.//

**System Notifications:** You assign today's mission to Che.

**Che:** Um, Chief, are you sending me out on a mission again? Can you ask someone else instead? My pinky feels a little weird today and I can't carry a weapon.

**Chief:** It's Bai Yi and K.K.. They need help.

**Che:** Those two? If it's for them, I guess I won't say no.

**Che:** Though they can easily handle half of the DisCity on their own, I'll be more reassured if I'm there.

* **Prompt:** Tell him about the mission

**System Notifications:** You give him the details of the mission.

**Che:** Chief, since I'm working while injured, you have to pay me double for this mission.

**System Notifications:** Che tugs at his cap and strides out of the Bureau quickly.
supervision6:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† Fast Driver

//Che has broken the records of a few car racing games in the Recreation Area.//

**System Notifications:** You hear [[[EMP]]] grumbling loudly in front of the car racing game console in the Recreation Area.

**EMP:** Ah! Which of you broke all my records?

**EMP:** I tried so hard and finally made my new record under three minutes!

**Che:** Oh, are you talking about me?

**System Notifications:** Che emerges behind you nonchalantly.

**EMP:** Yes, you! And you didn't just break my best record. Why did you have to snatch all my top ten ranking too?!

**Che:** Because this is the only game I play.

**Che:** If it bothers you so much, I can put your name in my records.

**EMP:** Ahhh! Why must you also destroy a player's heart after crushing her with your skills...
supervision7:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† Slack Master

//Che seems to have mastered the technique of sleeping with his eyes open.//

**System Notifications:** At a strategy meeting about dispatching Sinners, you find Che staring at the desk silently.

**Chief:** Che, any ideas from you?

**Chief:** Che? Che? Che!

**Che:** Ah... Ah? Chief? Yes, yes, I totally agree with your point.

**Chief:** Were you sleeping with your eyes open?

**Che:** Haha, how is that possible?

* **Prompt:** Ask him to teach you

**Chief:** Teach me when you're free. I could use that skill at meetings with the [[[Framework Against Catastrophe| FAC]]]. 

**Che:** You should have asked sooner. It's real simple. Just stare at that guy's mouth and imagine it's a door opening and closing, a swinging pendulum clock creaking and ticking... It's all endless gibberish. Eh, hold on, are you listening, Chief?

* **Prompt:** ...

**Che:** Am I saying too much?
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
There's nothing to be happy about catching someone like me, right? Keep going. Good luck on catching a better Sinner next time.

[Raise to Phase 1]
Wait. Do you think I'll stop being lazy when I get stronger?

[Raise to Phase 3]
Yeah, I'm so strong now! Is it time for me to get myself killed in Black Rings?

[Level Start]
Stay close... I have to at least take you back alive.

[Win Battles]
Let's go. It's just a few corpses. Nothing interesting.

[Lose Battles]
Ha... We can finally go home early.

[Ultimate Skill]
You can't escape!

[Die in Battles]
Can't believe I got defeated here...

[Greeting]
You're not expecting me to say hello to you, are you? You must have got too much time...

[Conversation 1]
You've got a grindstone? Jon and Jay are getting blunt. Why do I name my weapons? Nothing special. I just think it's fun.

[Conversation 2]
You wanna chat with me? Don't... I don't wanna chat right now. You'd better chat with someone else.

[Conversation 3]
I can give you some odd job if you pay enough. Forget aout fighting. I ain't good enough for that.

[Special Conversation 1]
Hey, wanna make a deal? This week I'll do whatever you tell me to. I promise, no slacking off... Can you help me buy that Deadlover Radio special collection?

[Special Conversation 2]
Every time I see K.K., I feel like seeing myself from the past‚Äî‚Äîit's too boring working all day long without any personal life. If I don't watch her, she will be sold by Bai Yi to pay off gambling debts sooner or later.

[Special Conversation 3]
I know Bai Yi gets drunk, gambles, gets into trouble all the time, and calls me a dwarf when she gets drink too much... but she is the most interesting person in the world from the time I met her until now. It has always been the case.

[Full Compliance]
I'm surprised that you, as the Chief, with such a face, didn't go suck up to those high officials instead of hanging out with a bunch of Sinners all day. You are an interesting one... Don't get me wrong. I didn't mean anything by that.

[Idle]
You tired? Take a nap then. Don't worry. I'll keep watch for you and won't let your men know their great Chief is slacking off.

[Annoyed]
Uh... Sis, what's your problem?

[Special Attention]
You do your work, I take my nap. Let's not get in the way of each other, okay?

[Dispatch]
Can you ask someone else to go? I'm busy.

[Dispatch Complete]
Let's leave it at this. I'm off now.

[Level Up]
Tsk. What a pain.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Reunion
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: For every enemy [Happy Hunting] hits, Che gains 7.5%/10%/12.5% additional Attack Speed for 15 seconds. The effect can stack up to 4 times.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"I accept your invitation."
"After all, it's more amusing this way, no?"

maniaIntensify.title: Core Breakthrough
maniaIntensify.text: Core damage from Ultimate increased by 1.

pros: Ult ready quickly at battle start

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + Hope + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Full energy set allowing Che to have his Ult ready quickly.

crimebrandSets.name: Nightmare + Hope
crimebrandSets.note: Provides an Atk & Atkspd amp for entire team lasting for the first 30 seconds of battle. Recommended in BFL.

crimebrandSets.name: Soul Rift + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Shreds the enemies' defense. Best for longer battles like TOA.

crimebrandSets.name: Justice + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Support set that buffs the team's Attack when Che uses Ult.

shackles.title: Efficient Hunter
shackles.description: Che's Normal Attack adds a third stage, using both a short knife and hand axe to attack.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: At the start of the battle, Che gains 10 points of Energy.

skills.name: Double Blades
skills.description: Che attacks with his dagger and axe alternately, dealing (84% of Attack damage) Physical Damage each time.

skills.name: Happy Hunting
skills.description: Che declares the start of a hunt while throwing his axe and dagger, dealing (400% of  Attack damage) Physical Damage and 1 Core Damage to all enemies within range and starts to [Track] them for 11 seconds.

skills.name: Jay the Dagger
skills.description: When Che's dagger hits an enemy he is [Tracking], that enemy takes 2.5% additional damage. The effect can stack up to 5 stacks, and lasts for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Jon the Axe
skills.description: When Che's axe hits an enemy he is [Tracking], there's a 20% chance he gets 1 energy.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Defense +6, Attack +4
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Defense +6, Attack +4, Unlock Requirementss: Dispatch Che 10 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Requirements: Che's Shackle Synchronization Rate increased to 5
Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: Difficult to do, it is better not to do it
supervision8:
++* ‚ö†‚ö†‚ö† Haggling

//Che has sent in a request.//

**System Notifications:** Supervision System: Chief, you have a new request.

**Che:** Chief, can I go out next Tuesday?

**Chief:** What for?

**Che:** I want to go to a meet-and-greet of the DeadLover Radio's creators.

**Che:** The ticket was so hard to get. I can't miss this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!

**Che:** Please! Chief!

**Chief:** Yeah...

**Chief:** I mean, I can let you go.

**Che:** I know you're the most understanding Chief ever!

**Chief:** But not without any conditions.

**Che:** Conditions?

**Chief:** I can let you go out, and in exchange, you can't shirk any missions or training in the next two weeks.

**Che:** Umm...

* **Prompt:** Reduce weeks
 * **Chief:** Having trouble? How about just one week then?
 * **Che:** Ah, that sucks. But to give you face, Chief, I won't say no.

* **Prompt:** Reduce weeks //[NOTE: This is a typo and meant to display "Increase weeks"]//
 * **Chief:** You still seem a little bit reluctant, let's make it three weeks then. Four weeks if you keep on hesitating.
 * **Che:** What? Damn it! Alright, deal, three weeks it is!
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Oh? It's just you. I'm working here. Whitestone just took on a debt collection job, and K.K. is in the middle of something else, so I had to come. I'm wearing this to look more like a badass. It's Bai Yi's idea, not mine.

[Greeting]
The job is not done yet. Relax, I won't do anything nasty. He's open for business. If I sit here and stare at everyone, he'll want me to leave and give me the money in no time.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Ugh, out of all the jobs they could've picked, they had to go for this debt collection gig, and of course, they forced me to do it... Well, if I can't get it done, so be it. It won't be the first job Whitestone couldn't finish anyway.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
If I keep sitting here, I'll be seen as their security guy. The only good thing here is free tea and snacks. Hey, you really not gonna have some?

[Idle] 
Hey~ You don't seem so busy. Why not join us in the back to play mahjong? Don't worry, the boss here is my buddy, he won't charge us.

[Annoyed]
Don't rub it. It's not a tattoo, it's just a sleeve. Why would I want to sting myself with some colorful needles?

[Special Attention] 
What brings you here? Well, not like it's any of my business. If you have nothing better to do, it's good to sit here and get some vitamin D from the sun too.

[Level Up}
Not again? It's so tiring to fight and kill.

voicelines.Greeting - EN: The job is not done yet. Relax, I won't do anything nasty. He's open for business. If I sit here and stare at everyone, he'll want me to leave and give me the money in no time.

voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Ugh, out of all the jobs they could've picked, they had to go for this debt collection gig, and of course, they forced me to do it... Well, if I can't get it done, so be it. It won't be the first job Whitestone couldn't finish anyway.

voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: If I keep sitting here, I'll be seen as their security guy. The only good thing here is free tea and snacks. Hey, you really not gonna have some?

voicelines.Idle - EN: Hey~ You don't seem so busy. Why not join us in the back to play mahjong? Don't worry, the boss here is my buddy, he won't charge us.
